_header: In wealth beware of woe what so thee haps / And bear thee even for dread of after claps
_description: A proverbial couplet in a series of six (see 6621.7)

OxfBal354.Transcription:
In welth be ware of woo what so þe happes& bere þe evyn
                    for drede of after clappes
OxfBal354.Note: In a collection of six proverbial couplets: 6621.7, 5794, 1587.8, 1433, 835, 3009.
